statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{7.30}; top has length \displaystyle{10.01}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{10.37} and \displaystyle{11.19}. The height is \displaystyle{10.20}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{10.01}+{11.19}+{7.30}+{10.37}={38.87}.
